name: And God said
description:
Submission for the 21th Lame Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/lame-jam-21), theme: Play God.

Sandbox particle creation/destruction simulator.

Left Mouse Button: create
Right Mouse Button: destroy

Particle types: 1) Monopole (positive); 2) Monopole (negative); 3) Dipole; 4) Custom (coming soon).

Interaction Range types: 1) Coulomb; 2) Linear (increasing with distance): 3) Linear (decreasing with distance); 4) Custom (coming soon).

Hard toggle: collision actives if switched on

Wipe Out: remove all particles from the scene.

Credits:
Music:  Air on a G string, orchestral suite no.3 in D major, BWV 1068 (Johann Sebastian Bach) ["Public Domain" license: https://orangefreesounds.com/air-on-a-g-string/]

Font: Ancient God (Koczman Bálint) [free license: https://www.1001freefonts.com/ancient-god.font]

Pictures have been generated with the midjourney AI discord bot [https://www.midjourney.com/home/]
